summary: A unit‑test suite dedicated to the Audio Spectrogram Transformer (AST) model that adapts generic modeling tests to the AST’s specific API, checking configuration handling, forward‑method signature, input‑embedding behavior, core model functionality, shared attributes, and loading from pretrained checkpoints.
business_intent: Ensure the AST implementation works correctly and reliably within the library by automatically verifying its configuration, execution, and compatibility with pretrained resources, thereby supporting robust deployment of audio transformer models.
